title: Ticket #4964: Update Globus GRAM package to support TLS
description:
In reaction to the POODLE SSL vulnerability, the Globus toolkit is moving to disable support for SSLv3 and force the use of TLS everywhere. The GRAM client library in Globus 5.2.5 will only use SSLv3. We need to apply an update that allows it to use TLS.

Specifically, we need to upgrade from globus_gram_client-12.4 to globus_gram_client-12.5. The code change is a single line that we can apply as a patch to the Globus 5.2.5 source at build time.

https://support.globus.org/entries/101814643
